subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Broke that association!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
It's a difficult concept for most, first just finding out there is something 
"after", and wrapping the head around that. EVP, and ghost hunting might be 
ok to start with for most, as I did, but I quickly found there was more, and 
it was a lot more interesting.

I would like to make my systems available, and find a way to stress that 
it's best used at home, you don't have to chase ghosts and spirits, they 
come to you, and have no travel restrictions. I've even got voices from 
"ghosts" supposed stuck at a haunting site, and come through on my box, in 
my basement. I think most of the "Ghost Hunter" stuff is Hollywood, and 
seems to be very profitable.

Think I'm gonna just lay low for a while. See if any Frank's Box clones come 
out.

Frank
